snippet.title: PYR token as Vulcan Forged team up with Matic!
snippet.description:
Huge news from Vulcan Forged as they release their own blockchain token, PYR in a link up with Matic, using the Arkane wallet.

For more information, visit the VulcanVerse Discord - https://discord.gg/ZyjTvFM

PYR token will allow all sorts of interaction with the Vulcan Forged ecosystem. Join the Discord and get involved!
